Articles.Content:
When I use RCS, this happens:

I think this is related to vernor engines.

Here are my mods:

toolbar

USI tools

texture manager

community resource

deadly reentry

fine print

firespitter

KAS

alarmclock

joint reinforce

MechJeb

NEAR

ORSX

Procedural fairings

Remote tech

SCANsat

texturesplacer

TAC life support

Kolonization

Karbonite

It's RCS Balancer, part of MechJeb. It throttles RCS and when it's active, the Vernor FX sprites scale up too much. It's probably because of how its FX are configured. I've been meaning to try transplanting another rocket's FX config over to the Vernor... one that doesn't have that sort of problem. That would probably fix it.
So I'm not the only one with that happening...
The weird part is that this is a new issue for me. And it makes the game mess up as I start getting graphics engine errors.
